knimeNode.name: Keras Network Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes a Keras network to a file.

fullDescription.intro: Writes a Keras network to a file.
fullDescription.option:
The writer to use.
Keras H5 Writer: Writes the Keras network including its weights to a *.h5 file.
The location of the output file. KNIME URLs like "knime://knime.workflow/ ... <filename>" are supported.
